item.title: Grafitti on play equipment, 19th August

item.title: Rubbish everywhere now there are rats who is supposed to be cleaning this street, 19th August
item.description:
I walk down this road (new church road se5 7JH) daily to go work and come back home there is so much rubbish everywhere on both sides of the road it smells so bad like rotting rubbish So I walk in the middle of the road Bins overflowing same old wet tissues cans and old destroyed boxes have been there for weeks so the cleaners are definitely not cleaning it, It has gotten so bad now I see rats running around and foxes everyone go pass absolutely disgusting There is a large old pub painted green with sooo much trash and fly tipping outside THIS ROAD NEEDS ATTENTION PLEASE LOOK INTO THIS
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, New Church Road, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: End of Kenilworth Road towards priory park road, 19th August
item.description:
This street is almost always full of rubbish left out by this big tree plus the street is NEVER swept. Never ever. The leaves and rubbish are just left to blow over to another street. Now there’s dog poo mixed in so it smells disgusting. Brent you really need to clean up the streets as it’s getting so dirty.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Priory Park Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
